subject: No Input from Throttle
description_text: Hello I recently purchased a set of pedals from Amazon and I am missing the platform heel plate and the throttle is not registering any input in the app, the brake works fine but the throttle does nothing.

conversations.body_text: Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  You can adjust the offset in the software, which will shift all pedals’ white signals close to 0%, and then recalibrate the pedals.

In the app, how do I adjust the offset?

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 9:52 PM service@simsonn.com

I tried doing that procedure and still no input from throttle, the brake
pedal is now fluctuating without me pressing it and after I calibrated it

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 9:54 PM Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo <
emmanuelibarra14@gmail.com> wrote:

> In the app, how do I adjust the offset?
>
> On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 9:52 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  You can install ToDesk—no registration required. I will provide the ID and verification code so I can assist you remotely to resolve the issue.

Okay provide ID and code


On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 10:51 PM service@simsonn.com

Please send code

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 10:54 PM Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo <
emmanuelibarra14@gmail.com> wrote:

> Okay provide ID and code
>
>
> On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 10:51 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  After installation, no account registration is required. Please click the close button in the top-right corner to enter the main screen, then provide me with the ID and temporary verification code.
When can you remote check this problem
Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  Do you have time right now?

I had another representative say that the throttle sensor is bad, he had me
connect it to the clutch hub and it still didn't work so he is sending a
sensor, could it be something else or does that confirm the fix

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 7:21 PM service@simsonn.com
嗨伊曼纽尔·伊瓦拉·埃莫西约，  请通过电子邮件将您的联系人姓名、电话号码、收货地址和订单信息发送给我，我们将寄送替换的节气门压力传感器给您。

Emmanuel Ibarra
5597364213
355 E Linden Ave, Reedley, CA 93654

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 7:39 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  Could you also please also provide the order number? We need to check your base plate.
Hi Emmanuel Ibarra Hermosillo,  OK. We will ship it ASAP. And ship the base plate to you from our US warehouse tomorrow.
